name: Edenor S.A.
description: Edenor S.A. is one of the leading electricity distribution companies in Argentina, providing energy to a significant portion of the Greater Buenos Aires area. Established in 1992, Edenor operates under a regulated framework and is committed to delivering reliable and efficient electricity services to its customers. The company serves millions of residential, commercial, and industrial clients, ensuring the stability and quality of the energy supply. Edenor is focused on enhancing its infrastructure through investments in technology and modernization projects aimed at improving customer service and operational efficiency. It plays a crucial role in the Argentine energy sector by contributing to the development of sustainable energy practices and fostering initiatives for energy efficiency. The company is also involved in various community outreach programs, promoting education and awareness around energy conservation. With a vision to lead the energy distribution market, Edenor continuously seeks innovative solutions to meet the growing demand for electricity while adhering to environmental standards.

seo.meta_title: Edenor S.A. | Leading Electricity Distribution in Argentina
seo.meta_description: Edenor S.A. is the principal electricity distributor in Argentina, serving Greater Buenos Aires. Learn about our services, community programs, and commitment to sustainable energy.

faq.question: What services does Edenor provide?
faq.answer: Edenor provides electricity distribution services to residential, commercial, and industrial customers in Argentina.

faq.question: Where is Edenor headquartered?
faq.answer: Edenor is headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

faq.question: What is Edenor's commitment to sustainability?
faq.answer: Edenor is committed to promoting sustainable energy practices and enhancing energy efficiency.
